title: Fantastic Location, Skyline View, Jr. 1 BR, Doorman, Pool
posting_body: Convertible 1 bedroom available August 15th or as late as September 1st.
Ample closet space, new plush carpet throughout, new refrigerator, new tile in entrance and new tile in shower with updated hardware and refinished bathtub.
A pool and large sun deck with grilling area are just a few of the other desirable features of the building.
Building offers 24/7 doorman and on site management.
Extra storage unit is included in price!
Garage parking is available through building at an additional cost.
The building is situated in the heart of Lincoln Park.

It is only a short walk to Lake Michigan and the beach, the Lincoln Park Zoo, weekly farmers markets, restaurants, shops, the Nature Museum, Conservatory, and right down the street from everything Wrigley has to offer!
For your convenience it also has three grocery stores in walking distance - Apple Grocery, Trader Joe’s and Whole Foods.
Additionally, there is a Target and Walgreens as well as many coffee shops.

Convenient public transportation - bus stop 22 and 36 located immediately outside the building, the 151, 156, 76 buss stop is one block away and train transportation served every five to eight minutes, Red, Brown and Purple, and is just a short walk down Fullerton, to get downtown and to all areas of the city!
This building is located in one of the most commutable and convenient areas with easy access to downtown.
The neighborhood is safe, clean and lively.
Owner pays for water, gas and electric (electric up to $40/month it usually doesn't go past that amount).
The building has a basic cable package and internet with RCN.
